0.text: Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets  below 50% of their maximum health deal 6 / 8 / 10% (based on level) of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against epic  monsters.

1.text: Contempt for the Weak can only affect enemy champions once every few seconds.

0.text: Active: Zed and his  Shadows throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals physical damage to all enemies struck in their path, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever he and one of his  Shadows or multiple  Shadows hit a mimicked ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.

1.text: Active: Zed's  Shadow dashes to the target location, remaining in place for 5 seconds and being able to mimic  Razor Shuriken and  Shadow Slash while in range. Living Shadow can be recast at any time while the  Shadow is dashing or within its duration.

2.text: Recast: While in range of each other, Zed and his  Shadow  blink to their respective locations, swapping places. If Living Shadow was recast while the  Shadow is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.

3.text: If an ability is cast while the  Shadow is dashing, the  Shadow will cast that ability once it has been placed.

0.text: Active: Zed and his  Shadows slash, dealing physical damage to enemies surrounding them.

1.text: Enemies hit by the slash of a  Shadow are  slowed for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness is increased by 50%.

2.text: Each enemy  champion hit by Zed's slash reduces  Living Shadow's  cooldown by 2 seconds.

0.text: Active: Zed becomes  untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he  dashes through the target enemy  champion over 0.4 seconds, after which he marks them, gains  ghosting for 3 seconds, and becomes targetable again. Zed also spawns a  Shadow at his casting position for 7.5 seconds which is able to mimic  Razor Shuriken and  Shadow Slash while in range. Death Mark can be recast after 0.5 seconds of his reappearance while the  Shadow is active.

1.text: For the next 3 seconds, Zed stores a percentage of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his  Shadows deal to the marked target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.

2.text: Recast: Regardless of the distance between each other, Zed and the Death Mark  Shadow  blink to their respective locations, swapping places.

3.text: If the target dies or is 1950 or more units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is cancelled, goes on a 5 second  cooldown, and Zed reappears at the cast location.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Zed and his  Shadows throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals physical damage to all enemies struck in their path, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
Passive: Zed restores  energy whenever he and one of his  Shadows or multiple  Shadows hit a mimicked ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.

Enemies hit by the slash of a  Shadow are  slowed for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness is increased by 50%.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – NIGHTSTALKER: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and  slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Champion  takedowns within 3 seconds reset this effect's cooldown and grant you  invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
